title: Can I score 300+ in biology by reading only NCERT and no other books? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: It's tough with just use of NCERT because Using just NCERT you won't be able to score high so it's good that you refer another reference as well. Through NCERT you can clear your concepts and basic but for more reference is good to refer. If we talk about particular NCERT textbook and NCERT examplr and exercise then it covers almost 70/80% of the exam questions because NCERT is common to book for the preparation so every student refer that book So apart from that you can select 32-year chapter wise questions by MTG for preparation because it's good reference book for the preparation it's good to use this kind of books for three major subjects (Physics, chemistry,Bio) You can also Refer Trueman for different types of objectives and question-answer. It helps a lot for the preparation and you can do well in the exam through these book. With that, you can also refer online videos as well it helps you to clear your doubt very quickly. You have many certain options for that like you have Toppr: the better learning app which provides complete free video tutorial for NEET. I hope my answer helps you. Thank you 👍 All the best!!

If I talk about this year's NEET question paper of biology you can see that almost 82 or 83 questions came from NCERT textbook. Not every one of them was direct but still were doable by reading the bible properly. I did a huge mistake of neglecting NCERT biology and ended up getting only 289. I missed some of the questions which were directly from the lines of the book. Now your answer- yes! You can score well above 300 by reading only NCERT. But do solve MCQs. Don't get distracted by coaching materials. These contain lot of BS. Only you can read human physiology and genetics portion from them. Best of luck! ~ _ ~

Yes, off course! I have seen many people did like that very well. Only the requirement is of taking too mich efforts with sincere planning and scheduling. You can easily score above 300 by reading only class 11th and 12th NCERT Biology but after sincere study. You have to read those book very thoroughly and deeply. Regular notes making and chapter reading make it easier to solve the NEET well. Along with that must focus on Physics and Chemistry too otherwise the situation can be reversed. Be confident and keep studying well. All the best *To clear your doubts flawlessly, and check for expert advice; use the Toppr Ask app now*

Hello everyone.. Yes it is possible to score 300+ by reading ncert word to word,line to line In neet 2019 ,i scored 321 marks in biology and i do mostly ncert , but some extra topics from notes like cell ,some topics of human physiology,biomolecules,some topics of ecology. but 300+ easily achievable by reading ncert many times(with full concentration). Thanku.

It is very difficult by reading only ncert. Although you will be getting 300 marks questions from ncert textbook you will not be able to answer them if your concepts are not that strong. You will learn to apply what you have learnt when you read more than only ncert. If you do not have sufficient time then concentrate on ncert only.

You’ll have to know the entire NCERT in and out for that. This means knowing all the diagrams, points, summary, etc I have written a similar answer initially, I recommend you read them- Siddhi Joshi's answer to Which book is best for NEET Biology?
